name: SaphirUltraX
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: saphir control
Developer Terms of Use
des: With the Saphir Ultra X skill for Alexa you can now control all essential functions of your Saphir pool completely via voice. Check out your water levels by saying e.g. "How is the temperature". Turn attractions on or off without even leaving your pool "Turn the lights on".
